description:
Cliff reminds me of a science teacher that I had in school. He was always so friendly and smiled all the time, and even though he was a little nerdy he was really cute and on hot days (when the lab coat came off) you could see that he had a rockin' body.
Well, Cliff isn't a science teacher, but it's kind of the same thing. When I first met him, I thought "wow, he's my type — cute but just a little nerdy". Then his shirt came off, revealing his amazing, chiseled body. Then his pants came off and out popped his nice big dick!
Cliff is 29, straight, an electrician, and in a long-term relationship with his girlfriend. But apparently he also has a taste for orgies — a subject that immediately puts a smile on his face!
title: Cliff
